website_summaries.verdict: This clear hardbody clutch gives you options, with an attractive golden cross-body strap that's both convenient and detachable.
pros: Hardbody clutch made of waterproof solid acrylic
Gel lining with attractive golden kiss-lock closure
Plenty of room for sunglasses, lipstick and more
Fits phones as large as the iPhone 8 Plus
Detachable golden cross-body strap with 23-inch drop
Measures 7 inches long by 4.3 inches wide by 1.9 inches deep
cons: Hardbody material prone to cracks if dropped or banged against firm surface

website_summaries.verdict: The unique hard box style and gold-tone accents give this feminine clutch a timeless quality.
pros: The hard acrylic shell allows the clutch to lay flat
Lacks the tacky feeling and funky smell of PVC
The kiss lock clasp shuts securely
Removable gold chain strap can be sized from 23 to 46 inches, long enough for cross-body wear
cons: If you drop this purse on a hard surface, it may crack
It’s big enough for a phone and wallet, but not much else

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the purse, however, one of the clamps arrived broken. I needed it for my trip so I used it anyway. I’ll put some gorilla glue or something strong to hold the clamp closed because I love that it goes with everything. I could fit my iPhone X in it with a small I.D card holder, cash, lip gloss and my pressed powder compact.
customer_reviews.author: CC Made This

customer_reviews.title: In love with it
customer_reviews.text: I was reading the reviews on here about the shipping, I picked same day delivery just because I needed it for a concert I was going too. (The whole "we need to check your purse mam go ahead and take everything out".) I absolutely love the purse. My purse came intact, its still together there were no scratches. I read reviews saying that the size they only fit their phone etc. Every time I've used it I've been able to put my phone, keys, and makeup in it, and it closes perfectly fine. It is a little heavy but overall its good!!
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This clear clutch is sooo adorable. It comes with two straps a small one ...
customer_reviews.text: This clear clutch is sooo adorable. It comes with two straps a small one and a shoulder strap. I've never really been a clutch purse kinda of girl, but I hate the idea of lugging my big purse on special occasions. Found this clear clutch along with another one and love how my iphone 7 plus fits perfectly in here, and then some. Happy customer, you will love.
customer_reviews.author: JessesGirl

customer_reviews.title: Broke first day
customer_reviews.text: This bag arrived in perfect condition, but my first time using it the chain broke and my bag fell to the ground and immediately cracked. Very disappointed to not even get one day of use out of this bag!
customer_reviews.author: LAURA V.

customer_reviews.title: Greaaattt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifullllll purse/clutch. It looks slightly 24k gold to me. I can't wait to wear it. It DID NOT come damaged. They have revised the way in which they package it possibly... It was slightly difficult to figure out how to open it. I thought it would break but it just simply snaps into & out of place. I'm wearing it the first chance I get
customer_reviews.author: hottmama

customer_reviews.title: The first one I ordered was cracked and I sent ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered was cracked and I sent that one back and got a new one. The first time I used it, it came apart at the top. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Terri L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this clutch
customer_reviews.text: Love this clutch!!!!!!!! And so do my coworkers and strangers on the street! People do noticed this cute clutch when I carry it to work and do stop me to ask where I got it. Only problem is it can be heavy when you fill it up, and if you're not careful the metal frame will detach from the clutch. Going to have my sister hot glue the frame.
customer_reviews.author: chrsitina

customer_reviews.title: Very Hard to Open
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute I ordered it for a concert but couldn’t even take it because I struggle so much to open it! The clasp is confusing and hard to open and I’m afraid to put stuff inside like phone or wallet and not be able to get it out. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: SpikesInk

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this clutch. When I first got it, it was very hard to open because I did not realize how. But once I figured out the correct side to press down it, it’s been very easy to open/shut. It fits a lot of items and it’s durable. I have gone out with it muiltple times and recklessly hit it against walls, tables etc but so far so good. I’ve gotten multiple compliments on it each time I’ve worn it out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Prime User

customer_reviews.title: This clutch is amazing. It's very sturdy and is great for all ...
customer_reviews.text: This clutch is amazing. It's very sturdy and is great for all kinds of events! It fit my phone, IDs/cash, lipstick, and few other small items perfectly! It's the perfect clutch size and not overly bulky so you can dance the night away with it in your hands. Or you can use the chain and carry it around with you in the day! The only thing I was kinda meh about is the "SharPlus" etched on the top of the toggle. Aside from that, this clutch is fantastic and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a glass looking bag it’s extremely cute and was packaged extremely well easy to open not hard at all ... BUT somehow still came scratched up all over the purse . It looks like it was scratched before packaging or used and then sent to me . Be careful when purchasing ! I’m waiting on my replacement to see if it will come brand new and intact or damaged again.
customer_reviews.author: Ri

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Evening Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Came boxed, nothing damaged no scratches or cracks. Plastic protection on the surface. Nice size for the essentials: lipstick and balm, travel size perfume, 1 flexible pair of ballet style slippers, small comb, and even enough room left over for a couple of other ladies necessities if required. Really, I was pleasantly surprised how much I could put in it. Can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture I would not call it perfect it's on the small side and will not hold much of anything other than a phone and lose money maybe lipstick which is fine. I just hope that the gold does not begin to tarnish. FYI I purchased this purse to go with some clear shoes I bought. Im 5'9 so I wish the chain was a little bit longer so that I can wear it as a cross body and it hit my hip rather than my waist.
customer_reviews.author: Sheneeses_Pieces

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, not at all durable
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase in its size, style, and functionality. The bag was plenty large enough to hold me phone, a small wallet, and a couple odds and ends. Over the course of the night, several people commented on how different and stylish it was, compared to the typical clear bag. Unfortunately, as the play concluded and I stood up to leave the theater, the chain strap broke completely. Total use time: 3 hours, many of which were spend sitting next to my seat, not being suspended by the chain. Additionally, the clasp itself is fairly difficult to use, making the purse hard to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: The glue used to hold the transparent part to the metal part didn't hold so the purse came apart meanwhile I was traveling and wanted to use it for the first time. Couldn't return it because by the time I made it back to the States, I had passed the date of return. It would've been nice otherwise. The clasp is also somewhat hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: KRKK

customer_reviews.title: The bag is BEAUTIFUL, but the chain is FLIMSY.
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars only because the chain broke. It is absolutely GEORGOUS and a perfect match for my clear strappy shoes. I was disappointed with the chain as it broke in 3 different places. I would fix 1 link and another would break. I was at an event so you can imagine how embarrassing it was. The chain is not durable for the purpose. I ended up taking off chain and carrying it as a clutch. It still looked good but the chain adds that special touch. If you make a more sturdy chain please surprise me with it.
customer_reviews.author: caseOBSESSED!!!!!!:)

customer_reviews.title: Love this little gem!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gem. Saw it on a video from a YouTuber and grabbed myself one! I received it in 2 days. I just got it today and can't wait to use it. Seems pretty sturdy. There are some comments that say it's really difficult to open but I did not experience that at all. It's a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DeBord

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bag! I have received many compliments on this purse, it is small but functional and stylish. My only complaint is that when it was full, I was still able to close the top latch but one side of the bag popped out of the middle golden liner. I was able to pop it back in securely, but I recommend not trying to fit too much in the bag or it may break open.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Clasp Locks
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bag once for a concert that required a clear bag. The clasp would "lock" and be almost impossible to open without having my husband force it open. Not great when you're in line trying to get your id and tickets out of your bag. Will never use again because of this. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: BreAasland23

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This clutch is really cute in person however, it does look like a twenty bucks clutch. I was glad that I could fit my Iphone 8+ in it. Besides a phone of that size, you can still fit a card holder (or small wallet) and a lipstick in it. In addition, I found the quality pretty good after the clutch was dropped from a high shelf and it didn't crack.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute clutch purse. It was wide enough for my phone which is pretty large, galaxy s10+. I was able to put that, my drivers license, 2 bank cards, my lip gloss, my mask, my keyes, sunglasses, vape pen, gum and phone charger. Its a pretty decent size clutch and lighty
customer_reviews.author: karleen tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Love it but very hard to open with little to no instructions in
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture And arrived fast! HOWEVER, It’s frustrating trying to figure out how to open. I was in the process of trying to contact the seller after trying over and over to open it and eventually decided to use my nail (fake nails) to lift the tab up a little then pull apart. Other than that love it and can’t wait to wear pair it with my outfit! Unfortunately I only plan to get about two wears out of it before the purse shatters from me being so rough to get it open.
customer_reviews.author: ashley16

customer_reviews.title: So much prettier than the competition
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this bag! I’m a pharmacist so I can’t have non clear bags at work and this keeps the essentials while complying with policy. The lost star is due to the fact that I struggle to open and close it. You have to pull hard on the lever and the chain is very difficult to keep out of the way when closing.
customer_reviews.author: DDaugherty

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I loved how cute this bag was when I got it and got many compliments but unfortunately, the third night I took it out, it cracked at the base. Very disappointing as it is super cute. I was just fitting my tiny card wallet and iPhone, and lipstick in there so.. for the price of you only need it for one event, then I would say it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: pokes wokes

customer_reviews.title: So cute...... //
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute sturdy purse. But, be careful how you handle your chain strap when wearing your purse. The chain links. are not as thick as I desire it to be, but it worked out and gave me the look I wanted
customer_reviews.author: TEXASGAL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stadium concert purse
customer_reviews.text: If you attend concerts, games and stadium events and your arena has a "clear bag policy" this is super cute, fits everything and fashionable. I got so many compliments on this, it took 4 different purchases to find the perfect one... this is it. Fits your cell, tickets, money, keys, lipstick,ID and compact plus a couple extras.
customer_reviews.author: jesskarwash

customer_reviews.title: LONG LASTING
customer_reviews.text: IV'E ORDER BAGS THAT I HAD TO SEND BACK BECAUSE IT WASNT DURABLE. ITS BEEN MONTHS SINCE I ORDER THIS BAG AND IT STILL LOOKS BRAND NEW. I RECIEVED ALOT OF COMPLIMENTRS EVERYTIME!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Small but Cute
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy Hard Plastic Purse it’s the cutest it’s well made it’s small but it can hold everything of importance you require for a ball game or a night on the town it looks just like the images however the images does not detail how small it really is I added a photo so you can see my small hand holding it
customer_reviews.author: Mizcali

customer_reviews.title: Worsening quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought from this company the exact item. Not sure if the quality went downhill or I just received a defective product, but you can’t even open this purse without struggling or getting your thumb all red and swollen.
customer_reviews.author: VonHops

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chain
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive this purse based on the other reviews. I received this purse on Tuesday and wore it last night to the football game. The purse itself is awesome and held up to the pouring rain, but the chain broke during the second quarter. I am very disappointed with the quality because this was the first time I used I was I was looking forward to using it all season.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Barrett

customer_reviews.title: this is absolutely the perfect size for my cruise
customer_reviews.text: this is absolutely the perfect size for my cruise . The quality exceeds my expectations. my phone fits perfectly with plenty space for my reading glasses, lipstick and small card/coin pursette. Highly recommend. will update when I return from cruise early 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Spring

customer_reviews.text: So many compliments! 5 more people ordered after seeing! Perfect for concerts! Clasp is secure and bag can fit my iPhone X max
customer_reviews.author: Bfx

customer_reviews.title: Cute clear gameday bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for gamedays because of clear bag regulations. Very cute but I’d say only problem is the latch is a little hard to use and I’m slighly worried about the chain breaking.. but no problems with it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Plein

customer_reviews.title: Love Box Clutches
customer_reviews.text: I love box clutches. This one is quite cute and durable. Was able to get more in it than I thought. Very nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: Temeka Wood

customer_reviews.title: Game days
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for game days...stadiums are being much more cautious with security so this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: H. Clem

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap item. Chain broke and mechanism to close broke while being used for 1st time to go to a dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is almost impossible to open the clasp! It took a lot of time and energy! But I took a small screwdriver and preyed it open and then used the screwdriver to bend the latch and left the screwdriver in place to loose it! TRUTHFULLY is not worth the time or effort! I do Not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to open. 😥😄
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT..💓 It's hard to open the first couple of times..But I guess that's to be expected. 😊 Looks really Expensive and Classy. 😜😎
customer_reviews.author: Kinyotta Delk

customer_reviews.title: Jammed clutch
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the clutch! But I wore it twice and the second time, the clutch kept getting jammed and hard to open. I only had my phone, cash, card, and lipstick in the clutch, but I think continuous opening/closing jammed the clutch part that fast only in 2 wears 😩! When it was jammed I hit it against the palm of my hand to help relieve the lock, but instead the side broke lol! Just a hot mess!
customer_reviews.author: Tranae Lanita Michele

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great. The size and style is great. However, I was expecting to receive yellow gold trim but it’s actually rose gold.
customer_reviews.author: Clysia R. McFall

customer_reviews.title: Look great, but easy break
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag for the first week I used it. Then the strap broke and its been shelved ever since. So..... If it's a one time use, go for it! If not, invest in better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: A Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory! Goes with everything and great for going out! Perfect size and style!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo cute
customer_reviews.text: This purse is soooooo cute. Looks exactly like the picture. It came wrapped really well. Bubble wrap on the bag twice. Once you take that off there is plastic stickers on both sides to protect the purse from scratching which is amazing. The strap coming inside of the clutch in plastic of course. It can be worse both with or without the straps. It's so cute. I totally recommend this clutch
customer_reviews.author: J.Starr

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the purse for the most part. My only dislike is i have the phone case with a wallet so it won't fit. I wouldn't let that small detail stop me from buying or wearing the purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Realy beautiful especially for the price, carried to a party received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for formal dinners and matches whatever I am wearing
customer_reviews.text: Great for formal dinners and matches whatever I am wearing. I receive lots of compliments every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: bonnefaye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect game day clutch!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect game day clutch! Very solid, great quality with a nice closure.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelylace

customer_reviews.title: Loved this clutch
customer_reviews.text: Loved this clutch! I purchased it for my sister in-laws wedding and received a lot of comments on it. I read in some of the other reviews that an iPhone Plus would not fit inside the clutch. I have a 7 Plus with a slim case and it fit just fine. Would so recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Everyone complimented this bag when I used it for a wedding. Held my I phone X Max, card wallet, and lip stick perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cute, but next time I would go with the darker plastic. Returning because I didn't end up using for a photo shoot, but if you're looking for this style, this is a pretty cute box purse.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Very trendy, great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is just a trendy bag. I get so many compliments on it! It is a conversation piece and a perfect size. I was nervous that all of my things would not fit in it - but I can put everything I need including my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS - perfect for sports games; just big enough
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Fits an iPhone 7 Plus, a lipstick or two, and keys perfectly. I use it for sporting events where they require clear purse. It feels durable and looks pretty high quality for what you pay. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! And not as compact as I initially thought.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It came just in time for me to wear to my best friends’s birthday brunch party. I love it. And she loves it too so I will be ordering it for her belated bday gift. It fits lipstick my iPhone 7plus, and my keys. I may even buy an extra one myself just to have! I have no issues with the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Sam

customer_reviews.title: Durable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to bring to a rock concert because I absolutely despise security rifling through my things. It held up well through all the jumping and jostling in the crowd, didn't even break when I had to cut through the mosh pit. Only downside is that if you tend to leave fingerprints, it's a little high maintenance. Good product 👌
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Brock

customer_reviews.title: Great to use in arenas
customer_reviews.text: So Cute! Great to use to take in stadiums and arenas that require a clear containers only for entry. Very stylish as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Small Stylish purse
customer_reviews.text: Ok pretty stylish small but fits my phone chapstick that's about it. Shoulder strap has came off a few times but easy to snap back
customer_reviews.author: Boujeebangs_hair

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful will start a collection of different ones
customer_reviews.text: Yeessss my first one but will order more brought 2 i kept 1 gave 1 to one of my daughters need to buy two more
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Cute but can’t broken so it couldn’t close.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute purse that I bought for a concert, but when I received it the clasp was completely broken off and I found it at the bottom of the purse. Unfortunately, this means the purse can’t close so it hangs open completely unusable. Very disappointing because it is quite cute.
customer_reviews.author: Crysta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clutch!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVEEEEEE THIS CLUTCH! Perfect.. looks exactly like the picture Unfortunately I wore it to the club and got drunk n dont know how i cracked it lol.. so i ordered another one and unfortunately it came damaged (badly cracked) I ordered another one so i ordered this clutch 3 times and retuning the second one since thats not my fault.... anyways buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: This is EXACTLY what I needed to complete my outfit! Love it so far. It's a good size and seems of good quality so far! 💕 I love it Be careful it does break easy! I ran into a poll, drunk, and busted it open like a window. Gotta order another one now. :(
customer_reviews.author: alexia rochell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken!!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is cute, don’t get me wrong. But it arrived broken. The top piece was separated from the bag and so I could not close the bag. Just a suggestion, if you know your going to a concert, order it in time so that you can return it if it’s broken or another one can be sent.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for stadium events! This meets the size limit which was important to me. Very cute and received lots of compliments on this!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Belknap

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my engagement photos. Had it customized. Love it and was a great hit
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes the purse but the clasp is a bit hard to open. I had to work with it for about 3 min before I got it open. Other than that it is a beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Daaiyah Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expextwd
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but i love it! Keeps all my stuff protected too
customer_reviews.author: Emily Landgrebe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for me. Used it on Valentine’s Day. Not too big not too small. Fits my cards, some make up and it fits my iPhone 8plus snugly. You can take the chain off and it’s a clutch
customer_reviews.author: Cin D

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Ok So this little bag is theee cutest thing ever! Love the versatility! The options of wearing this is boundless, I have not worn this out yet but it’s cinstructed well, seems to be sturdy! May have to replace the chain overtime but I’m super satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: ReadersAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love it - very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Loved this clutch. I purchased it for a concert. Very durable. The clutch is small, but it’s big enough for a small thin wallet, phone, and lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Looks expensive. Great quality. I would have given it 5 stars but it is a little difficult to open and close
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great stadium purse
customer_reviews.text: Great purse! I used it for my sister’s graduation. They wouldn’t let us bring in purses that weren’t clear. Very cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Chain broke the first time I wore it. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Chain broke the first time I wore it. The box completely broke in half the second time I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and has held up. I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and has held up. I use this for MLS games with zero issues. Gold is closer to a rose gold. I get tons of compliments. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: great quality goes with everything. Love the versatility removal chain lets me carry as cross body or clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like this for games
customer_reviews.text: I like using this for stadium games we go to--its regulation size and its clear. I do worry about the chain breaking--it doesn't feel the most stable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, I purchased to wear to the Beyonce ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and worth the purchase! Super cute, I purchased to wear to the Beyonce and Jay- Z concert! Now I wear when I go out on the weekend in the evening! Goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Shari H.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo cute! I get so many comments on this when I wear it! It’s fun and cute. Perfect for nights out but also regular use!
customer_reviews.author: GaGOooOooOCleVer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Friend loved this as a gift! Quality was nice and the purse fit what she needed with extra room to spare - iPhone 7+, thin wallet, lipstick, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute and durable. I bumped it down a start because the latch is really hard to unlatch.
customer_reviews.author: JessieT101010

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Very nice clutch but it is extremely hard to open. I always struggle to open and ask my friends or anyone who is around to help me open it which is why I give it 3 stars instead of 5.I am disappointed I will probably have to buy a new transparent clutch for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Trendy
customer_reviews.text: I received many compliments. This clutch can be worn to any event and it has a lot of space for personal items. I gave it 4 out of 5 stars because it was a little difficult getting the clasp open.
customer_reviews.author: Trichelle_Juliette88

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag and had it for about a year and is in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: monifa haynes

customer_reviews.title: The snap at the top is broken
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this purse and I could not wear it because the snap part at the top (to close the purse) is broken and I can’t return it because I just opened the purse 2 weeks ago I’m sooo upset because this is such a cute. So just make sure that’s it’s not broken
customer_reviews.author: Mo D

customer_reviews.title: Cute but have to be gentle
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute. I love it and I added vinyl design to it. I have no problem going into the stadium with it so it meets the NFL policy. I fit my galaxy S7 and my lipstick and compact but that is about it. The chain in a bit weak so you have to be careful not to break it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and it looks super cute. I've had it for one day and ...
customer_reviews.text: This clutch is EVERYTHING. Fast shipping and it looks super cute. I've had it for one day and got so many compliments. It's totally worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Sternenkind

customer_reviews.title: Adorable clear clutch great for sporting events
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It is so adorable it’s functional and fashionable especially now that you must have a clear bag to get into sporting events. I saw a woman carrying one and I went to Amazon and found it. So much cuter than the ones you buy at the events. Totally stylish you will not regret the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: **TOO CUTE**
customer_reviews.text: This was not too small and super cute. Was also handy when a purse check was needed for. My cells(2) fit with no problem and small change purse for my ID and money.
customer_reviews.author: Crystrh1

customer_reviews.title: Came Apart After 3rd Wear
customer_reviews.text: After my 3rd wear it came apart and my things were slipping out. So embarrassing!

customer_reviews.title: Cute purse!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this purse and paired well with the all white dress i wore.
customer_reviews.author: Meiah

customer_reviews.title: Cute clutch!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a cute clutch! I just can't get it to open as of yet... Lol It is hard to open, but I am not sure if it's because I am jusr being extra careful or what.🤔
customer_reviews.author: Keí

customer_reviews.title: Supper cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it’s soo cute and chic and just like the pictures

customer_reviews.title: Not too noticable but other than that it's pretty cute
customer_reviews.text: Came with a crack on the top. Not too noticable but other than that it's pretty cute
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag... i got so many compliments... i don't like the chain it came with so i placed my LV with it and it looks perfect! It can fit my Samsung Galaxy S9+ phone, a compact mirror and my compact credit card holder, my car keys, eyeliner, lipgloss, lipstick, mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Chasing Vizions

customer_reviews.title: Okay it took me like 30 min to get this open
customer_reviews.text: Okay it took me like 30 min to get this open, but it was easier to open after I opened it the first time. Im disappointed its not a little bigger. I guess I need to buy a smaller walllet now to go in it but it does look really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this clutch
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price! It’s perfect for stadiums/concerts and super cute goes with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not look cheap up close
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Chain broke. It is a bit flimsy. Fingers feel numb when you slide hand down type of metal. Case is edo Fred weight. Latch super sturdy and secure. Sides have not rubbed off.
customer_reviews.author: Kea Jackson

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Very Poor Quality! Order 2 of these. Both fell apart during the first use. Your purse falling apart in the middle of a concert, Nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: gary pressley

customer_reviews.title: Not Gold
customer_reviews.text: The trim is more of a rose gold. The chain seems gold. Not terribly noticable but I wanted gold. Purse is cute though and seems durable considering price. I would be careful with the chain.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very cute accessory! Classy amd stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clutch! It's so classy and fashionable. It arrived in 2 days and it was well packaged/protected in plastic upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: AM_customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Barley fits my phone but I always get so many compliments on it. So cute
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Love

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it and tried using it 5 months later only to find out that it is poorly made. It came apart, looks like cheap glue was used. Now I need to glue it back my self and hopefully it doesn’t come apart while out and about. Wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: yaya
